task.title: Deleting entities from the editor
task.shortdesc: The CWRC-Writer templates come with pre existing entities as examples to new users. You can easily delete these entities or any entities that you don't want in your document from within the editor (using right-click).

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: Highlight the text that is within the entity that you would like to delete.
step.info: Currently, removing an entity from the document that deletes the text as well.

step.cmd: Right-click on the highlighted text and choose the "Remove Tag" option.

taskbody.result: This will delete both the entity record in the left column and the entity (with text) in the document.
